message:
That's what I thought too. But when I saw that the method Task<string?> GetUserNameAsync() in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UserStoreBase (https://source.dot.net/#Microsoft.Extensions.Identity.Stores/UserStoreBase.cs,120) called cancellationToken.ThrowIfCancellationRequested() it made me wonder.

Thanks for the quick answer and all your great blog posts!
